entry.title: Photos Post 35: Special Events (after 1975), Part 33
entry.content:
Dear Sahaja Yogis and Sahaja Yoginīs,

We are pleased to let you know that 1 Photo of the special event 1920-0000 Event J, Boat has been uploaded to Eternal Moments: 1 high resolution from the Named Collections.
The direct link to the Photo of the event in the smallest gallery: Collection 1920.
Please kindly share the links with all our brothers and sisters.

Jay Śhrī Mātājī!

The Photo Subteam
sahajayoga.compilations@gmail.com
https://linktr.ee/comprehensivecompilationsteam
